content: Butter Chicken Bowl, anyone?🍗🍚 Introducing the ultimate comfort food, that's gonna make your taste buds go wild! Tender chicken smothered in rich butter sauce, served over fluffy rice and spiced with Indian flavors. So good, you'll be like "Butter, YASSSS!" Limited time offer, use code BUTTERBOWL10 for 10% off. Order now and treat yourself! #ButterChicken #Yum
